name: Dark Souls II: Crown of the Sunken King
name_original: Dark Souls II: Crown of the Sunken King
description:
Dark Souls II: Crown of the Sunken King is an action-RPG game developed by FromSoftware. It was originally released in 2014. It was published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. On review aggregator Metacritic, Dark Souls II: Crown of the Sunken King has a score of 82. The game is rated as "Exceptional" on RAWG.
You can play Dark Souls II: Crown of the Sunken King on PlayStation 3 and PC.
